entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is in trouble with Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends who is also in trouble with Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is another friend of Harry's who is being led by Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher at Hogwarts who is questioning Harry and his friends about their behavior.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is the caretaker of Hogwarts who takes Harry and his friends to Professor McGonagall's study.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall is questioning Harry about his behavior.
Professor McGonagall is also questioning Hermione about her behavior.
Professor McGonagall is leading Neville to the study.
Harry and Hermione are friends who are in trouble together.
